cause.description:
The road traveled by those facing a life-limiting illness can be a difficult one. It is a journey that many cannot walk alone. Hope Hospice, our area’s first hospice, has shared these journeys with countless patients and their loved ones since 1984 by providing everything needed to help manage the patient’s illness, including expert pain and symptom control, medications, medical equipment and supplies, various types of therapy, plus emotional, spiritual and bereavement support for the entire family.
1. People have the right to choose quality of life.
cause.mission: provide excellence in care, comfort, and education to all affected by life-limiting illness, grief, and loss.
cause.name: Hope Hospice
